content:
After the disappointment of the 2014 World Cup, John and Jack decide to take a break from their time traveling adventures and focus on their coaching careers. They continue to work hard and make a name for themselves in the football world, but they leave the time traveler's device behind, determined to let the games play out naturally.

For a while, things seem to be going well. John and Jack are successful coaches, and they are happy to let the past stay in the past. But then, one day, something happens that changes everything.

A group of mysterious, powerful figures approach John and Jack, offering them a deal. They have a plan to manipulate the outcome of a major football tournament, and they need John and Jack's help to make it happen. The stakes are high, and the consequences of failure could be catastrophic.

At first, John and Jack are hesitant. They don't want to get involved in anything that could potentially harm the sport they love. But as they learn more about the group's plan, they realize that they can't just sit by and do nothing. The potential consequences of their inaction are too great.

So, with a sense of trepidation, John and Jack agree to help. They know it won't be easy, but they are determined to do whatever it takes to ensure that the right team wins. They dust off the time traveler's device and get to work, determined to change the outcome of the tournament and make a difference in the world.
